sourcesContent:
// 문자열 정규화 (채점용)
export const norm = (s) =>
  (s || "")
    .toLowerCase()
    .replace(/[“”"’,!?.:;()-]/g, " ")
    .replace(/\s+/g, " ")
    .trim();

// Day별 문제 데이터
export const DAYS = {
  day1: [
    { korChunks: ["큰 저택이 있다"], eng: "There is a big mansion" },
    { korChunks: ["부엌 안에", "구멍이 있다"], eng: "There is a hole in the kitchen" },
    { korChunks: ["쥐 가족이", "거기에 산다"], eng: "A mouse family lives there" },
    { korChunks: ["그들은", "할아버지 쥐, 할머니 쥐, 엄마 쥐, 아빠 쥐, 오빠 쥐,", "그리고 여동생 쥐다"], eng: "They are Granpa Mouse, Grandma Mouse, Mommy Mouse, Daddy Mouse, Brother Mouse, and Sister Mouse" },
    { korChunks: ["그들은", "항상 배가 고프다"], eng: "They are always hungry" },
    { korChunks: ["고양이가", "부엌에 산다"], eng: "A cat lives in the kitchen" },
    { korChunks: ["그 고양이도", "항상 배가 고프다"], eng: "The cat is always hungry, too" },
    { korChunks: ["그는", "쥐를 먹는 것을", "좋아한다"], eng: "He likes to eat mice" },
    { korChunks: ["그는", "항상 기다린다", "구멍 앞에서", "쥐들을"], eng: "He always waits for the mice in front of the hole" },
    { korChunks: ["어느 날,", "오빠 쥐와 여동생 쥐는", "식탁에서 치즈를", "좀 가져오고 싶어 한다"], eng: "One day, Brother Mouse and Sister Mouse want to get some cheese from the table" },
  ],
  day2: [
    { korChunks: ["그들은", "구멍 밖을", "본다"], eng: "They look outside the hole" },
    { korChunks: ["고양이는", "식탁 근처에서", "자고 있다"], eng: "The cat is asleep near the table" },
    { korChunks: ["오빠 쥐는", "조용히", "구멍 밖으로", "몰래 나온다"], eng: "Brother Mouse quietly sneaks out of the hole" },
    { korChunks: ["그는", "식탁에서", "치즈를 가져온다"], eng: "He gets the cheese from the table" },
    { korChunks: ["여동생 쥐는", "기쁨에 소리친다,", "“앗!”"], eng: "Sister Mouse shouts for joy, Oops" },
    { korChunks: ["고양이가", "깨어난다"], eng: "The cat wakes up" },
    { korChunks: ["오빠 쥐는", "당황한다"], eng: "Brother Mouse panics" },
    { korChunks: ["그는", "달리기", "시작한다"], eng: "He starts to run" },
    { korChunks: ["고양이는", "그를", "쫓는다"], eng: "The cat chases him" },
    { korChunks: ["오, 이런!", "그는", "치즈를", "떨어뜨린다"], eng: "Oh no He drops the cheese" },
  ],
  day3: [
    { korChunks: ["그는", "재빨리", "구멍 안으로", "달려간다"], eng: "He runs into the hole quickly" },
    { korChunks: ["그 저녁에,", "오빠 쥐와 여동생 쥐는", "가족에게", "무슨 일이 일어났는지", "말한다"], eng: "That evening, Brother Mouse and Sister Mouse tell the family what happened" },
    { korChunks: ["쥐 가족은", "회의를 한다"], eng: "The mouse family has a meeting" },
    { korChunks: ["그들은", "고양이에 대해", "뭔가 해야 한다고", "말한다"], eng: "They say they have to do something about the cat" },
    { korChunks: ["그러자,", "여동생 쥐가", "아이디어를", "생각해낸다"], eng: "Then Sister Mouse comes up with an idea" },
    { korChunks: ["“고양이 목에", "방울을 묶는 게", "어때?”"], eng: "How about we tie a bell around the cat’s neck" },
    { korChunks: ["“그러면", "그가 깨어 있을 때를", "우리가 알 수 있어요,”", "여동생 쥐가", "말한다"], eng: "Then we’ll know when he’s awake says Sister Mouse" },
    { korChunks: ["쥐 가족은", "그 생각을", "좋아한다"], eng: "The mouse family likes the idea" },
    { korChunks: ["그들은", "매우", "신이 난다"], eng: "They are very excited" },
    { korChunks: ["그들은", "더 이상", "고양이에 대해", "걱정할 필요가", "없을 것이다"], eng: "They won’t have to worry about the cat anymore" },
  ],
  day4: [
    { korChunks: ["아빠 쥐는", "그의 서랍으로", "간다"], eng: "Daddy Mouse goes to his drawer" },
    { korChunks: ["그는", "긴 밧줄 하나를", "꺼낸다"], eng: "He gets a long rope" },
    { korChunks: ["엄마 쥐는", "그녀의 서랍으로", "간다"], eng: "Mommy Mouse goes to her drawer" },
    { korChunks: ["그녀는", "황금 방울 하나를", "가져온다"], eng: "She brings a golden bell" },
    { korChunks: ["“그래서", "누가 고양이에게", "방울을 달 거지?”", "할아버지 쥐가", "묻는다"], eng: "So who’s going to bell the cat asks Granpa Mouse" },
    { korChunks: ["쥐 가족은", "조용해진다"], eng: "The mouse family becomes quiet" },
    { korChunks: ["그들은", "눈을 깜박이고", "서로를", "바라본다"], eng: "They blink their eyes and study each other" },
    { korChunks: ["그들은", "한숨 쉬고", "또 한숨", "쉰다"], eng: "They sigh and sigh" },
    { korChunks: ["아무도", "그것을 할 만큼", "충분히 용감하지", "않다"], eng: "Nobody is brave enough to do it" },
  ],
};

export const DAY_LIST = [
  { key: "day1", label: "Day 1" },
  { key: "day2", label: "Day 2" },
  { key: "day3", label: "Day 3" },
  { key: "day4", label: "Day 4" },
];
